TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ListViewInsertionMark extends System.Object

summary.span: 將項目拖曳至 控制項的新位置時，用來表示預期的置放位置。

span.span: Used to indicate the expected drop location when an item is dragged to a new position in a control.

summary.span: 只有在 Windows XP (含) 以後版本上才能使用這個功能。

span.span: This functionality is available only on Windows XP and later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以擷取從屬性控制項，並使用它以視覺方式表示應該的置放位置拖放作業中，當項目拖曳至新位置。You can retrieve a from the property of a control and use it to visually indicate the expected drop location in a drag-and-drop operation when an item is dragged to a new position. 這項功能的運作時，才屬性設定為`true`及何時控制項不會自動排序項目。This feature works only when the property is set to `true` and when the control does not sort the items automatically. 若要防止自動排序屬性必須設為並屬性必須設為， ，或。To prevent automatic sorting, the property must be set to and the property must be set to , , or . 此外，插入標記功能無法搭配群組功能，因為群組功能排序的項目，透過群組成員資格。Additionally, the insertion mark feature cannot be used with the grouping feature because the grouping feature orders the items by group membership. 通常會使用類別中的處理常式或事件，以更新插入標記的位置，如拖曳項目。The class is typically used in a handler for the or event to update the position of the insertion mark as an item is dragged. 它也會在處理常式或事件，以拖曳的項目插入正確的位置。It is also used in a handler for the or event to insert a dragged item at the correct location. 若要更新的插入標記的位置，請遵循下列步驟：To update the position of the insertion mark, follow these steps: 1. 中的處理常式或是事件，使用屬性來存取相關聯的物件控制項。In a handler for the or event, use the property to access the object associated with the control. 2. 使用方法來擷取滑鼠指標最接近之項目的索引。Use the method to retrieve the index of the item closest to the mouse pointer. 3. 傳遞的索引值方法來擷取項目的週框矩形。Pass the index value to the method to retrieve the bounding rectangle of the item. 4. 如果滑鼠指標位於左側的週框的角落，設定屬性，以`false`; 否則，請將它設定為`true`。If the mouse pointer is located to the left of the midpoint of the bounding rectangle, set the property to `false`; otherwise, set it to `true`. 5. 設定屬性設為從擷取的索引值方法。Set the property to the index value retrieved from the method. 插入標記出現在下一步 指定的索引，到左邊或右邊，取決於項目屬性值。The insertion mark appears next to item with the specified index, either to the left or the right, depending on the property value. 如果項目拖曳至本身，索引便是-1，並已隱藏插入標記。If an item is dragged over itself, the index is -1 and the insertion mark is hidden. 若要在正確的位置插入拖曳的項目，請遵循下列步驟：To insert the dragged item at the correct location, follow these steps: 1. 中的處理常式或是事件，使用來判斷目前的位置，插入標記的屬性。In a handler for the or event, use the property to determine the current location of the insertion mark. 儲存此值，以用作稍後插入的索引。Store this value to be used later as the insertion index. 2. 如果屬性設定為`true`，遞增預存的插入的索引值。If the property is set to `true`, increment the stored insertion index value. 3. 使用方法來插入的拖曳的項目到複製中預存的插入的索引處的集合。Use the method to insert a clone of the dragged item into the collection at the stored insertion index. 4. 使用方法來移除原始的拖曳的項目複本。Use the method to remove the original copy of the dragged item. 因此索引中的值中移除原始複本之前，您必須插入的拖曳的項目複製插入之前，不會改變集合。You must insert a clone of the dragged item before the original copy is removed so the index values in the collection are not altered before the insertion. 若要確保顯示的項目時，會在其索引值的順序相同，您必須設定屬性的實作介面的索引值所排序的項目。To ensure that the items are displayed in the same order as their index values, you must set the property to an implementation of the interface that sorts items by index value. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。For more information, see the Example section. 您可以使用，以修改插入標記的色彩屬性。You can modify the color of the insertion mark by using the property. 如果您需要的大小或插入標記的位置，您可以透過取得其周框屬性。If you need the size or position of the insertion mark, you can get its bounding rectangle through the property. > [!NOTE] > 當您的應用程式呼叫時，插入標記功能是僅適用於 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列方法。The insertion mark feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. 在舊版的作業系統，插入標記相關的任何程式碼將會被忽略，不會出現插入標記。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to the insertion mark will be ignored and the insertion mark will not appear. 如此一來，任何程式碼插入標記功能而定，可能無法正常運作。As a result, any code that depends on the insertion mark feature may not work correctly. 您可能想要包含的測試，判斷是否可用，插入標記功能，並提供替代功能，無法使用時。You may want to include a test that determines whether the insertion mark feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，您可以略過所有實作拖放項目重新定位時不支援插入標記的作業系統上執行的程式碼。For example, you may want to bypass all code that implements drag-and-drop item repositioning when running on operating systems that do not support insertion marks. > > 插入標記功能會提供相同的程式庫，提供作業系統的佈景主題功能。The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要檢查此程式庫的可用性，請呼叫方法多載，並傳入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用插入標記功能，並使用標準重新實作拖放項目排列拖曳事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 插入標記的位置中的處理常式更新事件。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在這個處理常式中，滑鼠指標位置會相較於最接近的項目 的中間點，和結果來判斷是否插入標記出現在左邊或右邊的項目。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CPP/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CS/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/VB/listviewinsertionmarkexample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AppearsAfterItem { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AppearsAfterItem : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出插入標記是否出現在具有 屬性所指定之索引的項目右邊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the insertion mark appears to the right of the item with the index specified by the property.

value.span: 若插入標記出現在具有 屬性所指定之索引的項目右邊則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the insertion mark appears to the right of the item with the index specified by the property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您尋找的項目最接近滑鼠指標，但您必須執行您自己的計算，以判斷是否之前或之後此項目，應該會出現插入標記。The method lets you find the item closest to the mouse pointer, but you must do your own calculations to determine whether the insertion mark should appear before or after this item. 若要計算所需的值屬性，請遵循下列步驟：To calculate the value needed for the property, follow these steps: 1. 使用方法來擷取滑鼠指標最接近之項目的索引。Use the method to retrieve the index of the item closest to the mouse pointer. 2. 傳遞的索引值方法來擷取項目的週框矩形。Pass the index value to the method to retrieve the bounding rectangle of the item. 3. 如果滑鼠指標位於左側的週框的角落，設定屬性，以`false`; 否則，請將它設定為`true`。If the mouse pointer is located to the left of the midpoint of the bounding rectangle, set the property to `false`; otherwise, set it to `true`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱概觀參考主題。For more information, see the overview reference topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用插入標記功能，並使用標準重新實作拖放項目排列拖曳事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 插入標記的位置中的處理常式更新事件。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在這個處理常式中，滑鼠指標位置會相較於最接近的項目 的中間點，和結果來判斷是否插入標記出現在左邊或右邊的項目。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CPP/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CS/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/VB/listviewinsertionmarkexample.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Bounds As Rectangle
public: property System::Drawing::Rectangle Bounds { System::Drawing::Rectangle get(); };

span.span: Gets the bounding rectangle of the insertion mark.

value.span: ，表示插入標記的位置和大小。

span.span: A that represents the position and size of the insertion mark.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 週框矩形的插入標記中的座標是相對於左上角控制項。The coordinates in the insertion mark bounding rectangle are relative to the upper-left corner of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color Color { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };
member this.Color : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定插入標記的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of the insertion mark.

value.span: 值，表示插入標記的色彩。

span.span: A value that represents the color of the insertion mark.

value.span: 預設值為 屬性的值。

span.span: The default value is the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來設定插入標記色彩以外的前景色彩的值控制項。Use this property to set the insertion mark color to a value other than the foreground color of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用插入標記功能，並使用標準重新實作拖放項目排列拖曳事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 插入標記的位置中的處理常式更新事件。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在這個處理常式中，滑鼠指標位置會相較於最接近的項目 的中間點，和結果來判斷是否插入標記出現在左邊或右邊的項目。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CPP/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CS/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/VB/listviewinsertionmarkexample.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Index { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Index : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定旁邊要顯示插入標記的項目索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the item next to which the insertion mark appears.

value.span: 旁邊要顯示插入標記的項目索引，已隱藏插入標記時則為 -1。

span.span: The index of the item next to which the insertion mark appears or -1 when the insertion mark is hidden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有指定索引的項目左邊會出現插入標記屬性設定為`false`; 否則它出現在右邊的項目。The insertion mark appears to the left of the item with the specified index if the property is set to `false`; otherwise, it appears to the right of the item. 拖曳的項目插入時，插入標記會自動消失集合。The insertion mark disappears automatically when a dragged item is inserted into the collection. 若要移除的插入標記以手動的方式，比方說，拖曳至本身或拖曳控制項之外的項目，設定為-1 的值。To remove the insertion mark manually, for example, when an item is dragged onto itself or dragged outside the control, set the value to -1. 使用方法來擷取最接近指定的位置，例如定位在拖放作業中的項目時，將滑鼠指標的位置之項目的索引。Use the method to retrieve the index of the item closest to a specified location, such as the location of the mouse pointer when positioning an item in a drag-and-drop operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用插入標記功能，並使用標準重新實作拖放項目排列拖曳事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 插入標記的位置中的處理常式更新事件。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在這個處理常式中，滑鼠指標位置會相較於最接近的項目 的中間點，和結果來判斷是否插入標記出現在左邊或右邊的項目。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CPP/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CS/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/VB/listviewinsertionmarkexample.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 NearestIndex(valuetype System.Drawing.Point pt) cil managed
Public Function NearestIndex (pt As Point) As Integer

param.name: pt
param.span: ，表示要從此位置尋找最接近的項目。

span.span: A representing the location from which to find the nearest item.

summary.span: 擷取最接近指定點的項目索引。

span.span: Retrieves the index of the item closest to the specified point.

returns.span: 最接近指定點的項目索引，如果最接近的項目是目前正在拖曳的項目，則為 -1。

span.span: The index of the item closest to the specified point or -1 if the closest item is the item currently being dragged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您在進行拖放作業，找出最接近的滑鼠指標的項目。This method lets you locate the item closest to the mouse pointer when doing a drag-and-drop operation. 使用索引傳回的值來設定屬性。Use the index value returned to set the property. 當滑鼠指標最接近的項目正在拖曳的項目，這個方法的傳回值為-1。When the item closest to the mouse pointer is the item being dragged, the return value of this method is -1. 在此情況下，設定屬性設為這個值會隱藏插入標記。In this case, setting the property to this value hides the insertion mark. 這個方法會尋找最接近的項目，將滑鼠指標所在位置，而不論方法會傳回在指定的位置，項目或`null`如果該位置沒有任何項目。This method finds the closest item regardless of where the mouse pointer is located, while the method returns the item at the specified location only, or `null` if there is no item at that location. 方法會傳回`null`，比方說，當滑鼠指標位於兩個項目。The method returns `null`, for example, when the mouse pointer is located between two items. 基於這個理由，您應該一律使用方法時使用拖放作業來定位項目。For this reason, you should always use the method when using a drag-and-drop operation to position items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用插入標記功能，並使用標準重新實作拖放項目排列拖曳事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 插入標記的位置中的處理常式更新事件。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在這個處理常式中，滑鼠指標位置會相較於最接近的項目 的中間點，和結果來判斷是否插入標記出現在左邊或右邊的項目。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CPP/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CS/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/VB/listviewinsertionmarkexample.vb#3)]
